answer.para: CMView was developed by the Structural Proteomics Group at the Max Planck Institute for Molecular Genetics.

question.para: What are the license terms for CMView?

answer.para: CMView will be released under an open source license. If you use CMView in published work, please cite this website.

question.para: How to cite the CMView software?

answer.para: A publication describing CMView is being prepared. For the moment, please use the following citation:

para.emphasis: CMView: Interactive Contact Map Visualization and Analysis. http://www.molgen.mpg.de/~lappe/cmview/.

question.para: I am getting a Java out of memory exception. What can I do?

answer.para: For large proteins the contact map calculation may use more than the preset amount of memory. Try setting the -Xmx parameter in the startup script to a higher value (e.g. -Xmx512m or -Xmx1024m).
